db_read_sql_select: SELECT f.header_id, 'CMS1500' AS form_type, cms_id AS bill_header_id FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_cms1500 f WHERE f.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID> UNION ALL SELECT f.header_id, 'UB04' AS form_type, ub_id AS bill_header_id FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_ub04 f WHERE f.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID> UNION ALL SELECT f.header_id, 'DWC066' AS form_type, dwc_id AS bill_header_id FROM txm_bitx_kofax_staging.kofax_dwc066 f WHERE f.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>
SELECT f.header_id, bill_id FROM txm_bitx_eci_staging.eci_bills f WHERE f.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>
